entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @narendramodi Hi, all. Do check out our page for Covid-19 medical essentials to protect yourselves today! We fulfill bulk orders. All the products are mentioned in pinned tweet. To order you can contact us anywhere you please from the information in the bio. Stay safe, stay healthy. #covid19
